mapper.select: select c.last_message as lastMessage, c.updated_date as updatedDate, c.chatroom_no as chatRoomNo, c.host_no as hostNo, c.user_no as userNo, u.user_name as name, u.user_image as image from TB_FINAL_CHATROOMS c, TB_FINAL_USERS u where c.user_no = u.user_no and host_no = #{no}

select c.last_message as lastMessage, c.updated_date as updatedDate, c.chatroom_no as chatRoomNo, c.host_no as hostNo, c.user_no as userNo, h.host_name as name, u.user_image as image from TB_FINAL_CHATROOMS c, TB_FINAL_USERS u, TB_FINAL_hosts h where c.host_no = h.host_no and h.host_user_no = u.user_no and c.user_no = #{no}

select c.chatroom_no as chatRoomNo, c.host_no as hostNo, h.host_name as hostName, h.host_user_no as hostingUserNo, h.hosting_type as hostingType, h.host_tel as tel, h.grade_name as gradeName, m.SENDER_NO as sendingUserNo, u.user_name as sendingUserName, u.USER_IMAGE as sendingUserImage, m.RECEIVER_NO as receivingUserNo, r.USER_IMAGE as receivingUserImage, r.user_name as receivingUserName, m.MESSAGE_CONTENT as content, m.MESSAGE_CHECKED as checked, m.MESSAGE_SENDING_DATE as sendingDate from tb_final_hosts h, TB_FINAL_CHATROOMS c, TB_FINAL_MESSAGES m, TB_FINAL_USERS u, TB_FINAL_USERS r where c.chatroom_no = #{no} and c.chatroom_no = m.chatroom_no and c.host_no = h.host_no and m.sender_no = u.user_no and m.receiver_no = r.user_no order by m.MESSAGE_SENDING_DATE asc
select chatroom_no as no, host_no as hostNo, user_no as userNo, updated_date as updatedDate from TB_FINAL_CHATROOMS where host_no = #{no} order by updated_date desc
select chatroom_no as no, host_no as hostNo, user_no as userNo, updated_date as updatedDate from TB_FINAL_CHATROOMS where user_no = #{no} order by updated_date desc
